  <router-link to="statistics">Statistics </router-link>

</template>

```js
**vue init nuxt/starter <project-name>**

```

```js
**vue init nuxt/starter profitoro-nuxt**

```

```js
**cd profitoro-nuxt**
**npm install**
**npm run dev**

```
